name: Ribbon
description: Butterfly hairband made of strips of cloth, mainly made for women.

name: Ribbon [1]
description: Butterfly hairband made of strips of cloth, mainly made for women.

name: Ribbon [1] Blueprint
description: Butterfly hairband made of strips of cloth, mainly made for women.

name: Rice Cake
description: Rice flour kneaded to the appropriate size, filled with stuffing, made into a semi-circular shape, and covered with pine needles. Can restore up to 10% of HP. During PVP periods, there will be reduced HP Regen. During CD periods, the effect will be greater.

name: Rice Dumpling Box
description: A festival box from the distant east. It’s heavily loaded with all kinds of good stuff! ~(Open to gain guaranteed 200x Herb of Incantation, 1x Sticky Rice Dumpling and one of the following items: 1x Seed of Mastela, 1x Mora Coin, 1x Lightning Chain, 1x Gold Medal, 1x Guild's Gift, 50x Eden Coin)

name: Rider Insignia
description: A badge that a fast runner likes to use. As long as you wear it, You would like to run.

name: Rider Insignia [1]
description: A badge that a fast runner likes to use. As long as you wear it, You would like to run.

name: Ring
description: An ordinary ring we can find in stall vendor. It can be a choice of gift.

name: Ring Pommel Saber [2]
description: A knife whose end is circular.

name: Ring Pommel Saber [3]
description: A knife whose end is circular.

name: Ripple
description: When the weather is nice near the sea, the waves lap at your feet, Distorting their image as if they were in a bottle.

name: RO x Ultraman Premium
description: Brave adventurers of Midgard, you’ll fight alongside Ultraman from outer space this time. Justice will prevail!

name: Roast Chips
description: Delicious snacks from the other world. AGI ＋ 10, Attack Spd ＋20%, For 30 min. (The effect cannot be stacked with Agi food)

name: Robe of Cast
description: College Mages usually wear this when they make magic scrolls so as to improve their affinity.
effect: INT ＋4,[Wizardry Staff VIII] ＋ [Robe of Cast VIII] ＋ [Eye of Dullahan VIII] ＋ [Crystal Pumps IV]: －5% CT Variable, ＋3% M.Dmg, ＋3% Ignore MDef

description: College Mages usually wear this when they make magic scrolls so as to improve their affinity.
